# Unicode to CP850 mapping table
# 2023-01-21 M. Brutman

# Values 0x00 to 0x1f from
# https://github.com/torvalds/linux/blob/master/drivers/tty/vt/cp437.uni.
#
# Values 0x80 to 0xff based on https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Code_page_850
# with some additional mappings added.

0x263a 0x01
0x263b 0x02
0x2665 0x03
0x2666 0x04
0x25c6 0x04
0x2663 0x05
0x2660 0x06
0x2022 0x07
0x25d8 0x08
0x25cb 0x09

0x2640 0x0c
0x266a 0x0d
0x266b 0x0e
